title: Software Engineer, Atlas
description: As a Software Engineer on the team, you will build and ship features into North, our AI workspace platform, and collaborate closely with researchers to refine parsing strategies for effective search outcomes.
requirements: Professional experience coding in Go
Experience with database migrations, ETL pipelines, and transforming raw data
Built personal or professional projects using search, retrievals, or vector databases
Strong coding abilities and comfortable working across the stack
Excited by the challenge of securely connecting users to their most relevant data
Nice to have: Experience with Kubernetes or React
Experience in both large enterprises and startups
Ability to excel in fast-paced environments
benefits: An open and inclusive culture and work environment
Work closely with a team on the cutting edge of AI research
Weekly lunch stipend, in-office lunches & snacks
Full health and dental benefits, including a budget for mental health
100% Parental Leave top-up for up to 6 months
Personal enrichment benefits towards arts and culture, fitness and well-being
Remote-flexible, offices in multiple cities, and a co-working stipend
6 weeks of vacation (30 working days)

title: Customer Success Manager
description: As a Customer Success Manager at Siena, you will own a portfolio of customers and ensure they achieve specific, measurable outcomes. You will work at the intersection of customer, product, and engineering to drive real metrics and enhance customer experiences.
requirements: 3+ years in Customer Success Management or client-facing strategic roles
Proven track record with customer service technology platforms
Experience working closely with product and engineering teams
Comfort operating in fast-moving environments
Demonstrated ability to drive customer growth and retention
Experience in AI/ML space, particularly conversational AI
Hands-on prompt engineering experience
Comfort with API integrations and business intelligence tools
benefits: Meaningful impact on product and company
Globally distributed team
Great salary plus equity or stock grants
Learning budget for personal growth
Opportunity to build something new
AI-fluency development
Tackle unsolved problems

title: Country Manager
description: The Country Manager - Germany will drive year-over-year revenue growth, developing & executing on customer and partner acquisition strategies in Germany.
